lead_paragraph: England winger Chris Ashton has lost his appeal against a 10-week ban for eye-gouging that has ruled him out of the Six Nations championship, European Professional Club Rugby said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: England Winger Ashton Loses Appeal Against 10-Week Ban
headline.main: England Winger Ashton Loses Appeal Against 10-Week Ban

snippet: England winger Chris Ashton has lost his appeal against a 10-week ban for eye-gouging that has ruled him out of the Six Nations championship, European Professional Club Rugby said on Thursday....
